response.overview: In rural India, Bhootnath, a young man burdened by his late father`s humble legacy, falls in love with Gauri, facing rivalry from Totla Totaram. His life takes a magical turn when disguised as Lord Shiva, he encounters spirits who bless him, transforming his fate. With newfound fortune, he overcomes challenges and unites with Gauri, bringing harmony to their lives.
response.title: Bhooter Pallay Bhootnath
